item.name: §f5th Meeting §f§oby §fCenedril Aeglos
item.title: 5th Meeting
item.author: Cenedril Aeglos
pages:
ROLL CALL:
Shaman Geoffry of Drazirahc - present
God Kind Barthiouse of Amestrius - present
High-Lord Allorik - present
Grandmaster Aeglos - present
Mr_Admin_Guy - present

First Motion:
Inducting Bernie to the UN council

Votes:
5 Yea

Unanomous vote, motion seconded, carried, and passed.

Second Motion:
Ability to hold a council meeting with 1 member absent.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
4 Yay
1 Nay

Motion carried and passed.

Third Motion:
Shared exploration for cartography. 

Motion seconded.

Votes:
3 Yay
1 Nay
1 Abstain

Motion carried and passed.
Geoffry asked for permission to build a portal house near spawn area. This is not a council disicion, and he has permission.

Fourth Motion:
Meetings will be private.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
3 Yay
1 Nay
1 Abstain

Motion carried and passed.

Fifth Motion:
Council records shall be private, not public record.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
1 Yay
2 Nay
2 Abstain

Motion carried, but not passed.

First Discussion:
Construction of the new council chambers. After good arguments, we have decided to build it underground. Floating in the air proves to be too distasteful.

Sixth Motion:
Building new council chambers underground.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
3 Yay
1 Nay
1 Abstain

Motion carried and passed.

Seventh Motion:
Chambers will be built in creative.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
3 Yay
2 Abstain

Motion carried and passed.

Eighth Motion:
Massive Books plugin. A book which contains all rules, plugins, and commands for the server. This book is live, meaning that all changes will be made in real time to all books.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
4 Yay
1 Nay

Motion carried and passed.

Ninth Motion:
Day/Night cycle should be extended.

Motion seconded.

Votes:
5 Yay

Unanomous vote, motion carried and passed.
This concludes the fifth meeting of the Elder Council. Meeting Adjurned.
